action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eric Young replaces Esmil Rogers.

action.des: With Marco Scutaro batting, Eric Young steals (4) 2nd base, . Eric Young advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Mike Nickeas.

pitch.cc: Chris Schwinden showed faith in Mike Nickeas by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 15 for Manny Acosta; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .150 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .308 off him after that.
